A friend and i were walking in a street near the Sandhya Pg mess when a man on a bike (he wore a black jacket, had short black hair, was dark and the bike had a red end), pinched my ass and sped off. Later on, he was seen outside my pg while i was returning home by my friend who dropped me home.
I was walking on the road with a friend and a guy in black jacket, short black hair rode past us on his bike, and groped my friend while we were walking

My friend and I were walking to House 40 at 10pm, we were quite alert about a white sports bike following us, but when we almost approached the house, we noticed he had slowed down, and was inches away from groping us. We were able to dodge the attack, and he immediately fled.

Me and two of my friends were followed by a man in a black honda city  DL10CK2303 . The man kept making rounds again and again and would stop near us. The car stopped outside H.N. 112 since were standing outside
A man , probably drunk or high followed me while making odd noises

I was standing with two three of my friends on the footpath. An obviously drunk man was walking towards us and began to approach us. We started walking away but he continued to follow us and blatantly kept coming closer. At some point, we were half-running and saw him laughing at us being scared. We finally asked the NCC guards if we could stand inside and they let us. But the drunk man continued to hand around and try and approach us. When he was asked to go away he pretended to make calls which we could see while hanging around and the guards let him sit with them for a while which made us even more uncomfortable.
A drunk man followed us for a while and even though we went inside the gate of NCC he found a chair and sat outside before walking away and circling back

My friend and I were walking back home at around 10:20pm and I saw a man wearing a blue checked shirt peeing behind a tree. He saw me looking at him. I looked away and i was just walking further ahead on that road. The man came behind in fast speed on his bike and spanked me and rushed past

a dark coloured Honda car followed us, circled the place where we were standing about 5-6 times, rolled down the window around us and yelled obscenities at us and then parked the car about 5 mtrs away from us and stared at us. Number plate: DL 10 CK 2303

A middle aged man on a scooter slowed down beside me and asked if I wanted a drop somewhere. When I shook my head and continued to walk forward, he sped up and slowed down next to me again and asked I was tee to talk. I continued to walk and he left.
2 men on the bike threw something on me from a bottle. The bike didn’t stop so I couldn’t see any number but I could see they were laughing.

I was riding my cycle at around 1 noon back to my pg, I was coming from the direction of the n5 campus and my pg is close to the taste of india restaurant. So when I turned in that right turn to take that road, I immediately noticed that there were group of me, possibly drunk, possibly, and one of then tried to intercept my way. He stuck his hand out as if he was asking for a ride and kept asking me to stop. He saw me drivert from a longer distance and tried intercept again. I was riding fast so as the distance between us reduced I could quickly take a bigger diversion and avoid any physical contact, or crash. There were other people on the road they did notice what was going on but said nothing about it. After I crossed them I heard one of the other men say that "forget it she's wearing headphones" in kannada, I heard it because I didn't have any music on and the cord was not even connected to my phone. I quickly reached my pg and reported on the whatsApp group but it was a scary moment because God forbid it was a narrow road I would been in a much much worse situation, without being able to take that divertion. I feel I narrowing escaped a very ugly incident.

A man on a motorcycle kept going past us on our walk, almost 2-3 times during a 1 hour long walk. Eventually, he slowed down near us and groped by butt and sped away. On instict, I yelled at him and ran behind him but he was too fast and he went out of sight within a matter of seconds.
asdfasd

Then when I went into freshmart, I stayed inside because I thought he might go away, but when I came out he was still there and standing advancing towards me. I was walking from my pg to the mess with 2 other people  when a bike came up behind us after slowing down so that we didn't hear hear him. He groped me, continued to ride ahead while looking back, smiling and flipping us off.

He came in very close proximity to us, and circled around our pg for a bit. This was near mahaveer and around the sandhya mess. He was wearing a blue shirt. Just be careful.

The we’re on a white activa and the scooty number was either 6612 or 6621

column5: Silver Oak, Kodigehalli Main Road, Hoodi
column6: I was on my way to pick up my daughter from a place nearby. A Scooter MH 19 BK 4595 overtook me from left side in a clear attempt to force me to hit the scooter coming from the opposite direction. I was thankfully able to avoid collision but when I blew my horn while braking abruptly so that others around me keep a distance and are aware in some way to be careful, the rider who was intentionally driving just 4-5 meters ahead of me while looking in his rear view, started mocking me by shaking his head probably laughing as well. Then with his right hand he made lewd gestures for the rest of the journey that i was behind him(I can give details if needed). I took about a 20 metre detour to see his number plate, I loudly recited his number plate in order to remember it before I could get a spot to stop and note it down, after which i went back to my destination. The casual way in which he did this clearly showed that it must be his usual behaviour and may some day take someone's life. I would like to let you know, that I'm a seasoned driver 33 years of age and this action from him was totally unprovoked. This happened just 20 metres ahead of my apartment gate so I had not way of sharing the road with him before this happened. I really hope he is talked to and counselled so that he mends his ways before it proves fatal for someone.

I was walking back home from my choir practice yesterday and I had to cross a bridge over a railway (ITC to coxtown bridge over the railway)to get to my area. So it was dark and i had my phone torch on. It's a 4 zig zag lines bridge with one flat path. When I was walking on that flat surface it was dark but I could see a bit. Suddenly I could hear footsteps like someone was running and my heart leaped out when I saw a silhouette of a man and he grabbed me from behind and I didn't even know I could give that blood curling scream. He groped my chest and held both my arms from the side and groped my chest with one hand . But after I screamt the man suddenly left me and ran. I couldn't see his face and he didn't make any noise except running to and forth during the incident. My emergency sos was on and the call was answered after I shouted at the man when he ran away. I was shivering fully almost had a panick attack but I kept walking and when I reached my area where it was crowded due to the village festival that ended yesterday there was a lot of crowd. I drank some water and went home, took a shower and slept. I didn't tell anyone of this incident. I didn't even look at the man's face nor heard his voice. If a police is reading this I request you to please install a CCTV on the bridge. Atleast 3 one at the entrance, one at the other exit and one in the middle of the bridge where this incident happened to me. Now after this incident whenever I hear any footsteps or hear someone running I immediately feel scared and panic
A man flashed his genitals at me on the public road at 11am

I was travelling in my bike which is registered in Tamil Nadu, in the 3 lane road I was travelling in the right side lane and a Innova buy was in lane 2 while I was going past him, he came to my lane pushing me to the roads end. There are too many pot holes in the right side of the road. Hence I speed up and shook my head with disappointment. May be because of my number plate this guy started chasing me and abusing me on the road and came very close to hit my bike and he speed up and blocked my bike and stared shouting at me. This guy was furious, i was scared for my life. He came as if he would kill me. My adrenaline kicked in and I started my bike  and took off through a small gap I saw. Didn’t look at his number plate though. Looked like a driver and not a owner. Possibly yellow board

Now the person sees me in the park and orders me to take my dog on the road as he claims the lake park is his as he is Kannada. He told me to go to Delhi to walk my dog.
